meta.title: Home - Marion City Schools

meta.name: description
meta.content: Marion City Schools is a public school district in central Ohio. Our mission is to inspire a community of achievement. We focus on preparing students to be college/career ready.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Marion City Schools, Marion Ohio schools, Marion Ohio school district
Marion City Schools is a public school district in central Ohio. Our mission is to inspire a community of achievement. We focus on preparing students to be college/career ready.

li.a: Why Work at Marion City Schools

p.strong: Click here to access the MCS Distance Learning Guide

a.strong: Click here to access the MCS K-12 Grading Information for Families

p.strong: Steps to access the Online Learning Dashboard

hr.p: A.) Click here to view the Step by Step Guide to Log In to Google Chrome
B.) Once logged in to Google Chrome, visit www.mcspresidents.org
C.) Click the icon for your teacher's online curriculum

p.strong: Steps to access help with Technology Access

hr.p: A.) Visit the Technology Support Website
B.) Email support@mcspresidents.org, which is monitored from 8am-4pm
C.) Call 740-206-9804 from 8am-4pm Monday through Friday

p.strong: Internet Access Information for Marion families
